articles.title: Has Android 11 FINALLY fixed the biggest problem with Google's operating system? - Express
articles.description: ANDROID 11 is rolling out faster than any previous version of the mobile operating system and is quickly catching-up with Android 10, according to some data. So, is it too early to pop the champagne, or has Google finally solved one of the biggest negatives o…
